file.name: http-binding-hypermedia-uritemplates.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: SimpleHypermediaAPI version: "1.0" servers: - url: http://map.mdsl.hateoas tags: - name: RESTLevel3Provider-Home externalDocs: description: HypermediaDrivenEndpoint contract, Processing Resource role url: https://microservice-api-patterns.org/patterns/responsibility/endpointRoles/ProcessingResource.html - name: RESTLevel3Provider-ResourceForStep2 externalDocs: description: HypermediaDrivenEndpoint contract, Processing Resource role url: https://microservice-api-patterns.org/patterns/responsibility/endpointRoles/ProcessingResource.html paths: /home: summary: activity-oriented endpoint post: tags: - RESTLevel3Provider-Home summary: initiateProcess (write only method) description: '[State Creation Operation](https://microservice-api-patterns.org/patterns/responsibility/operationResponsibilities/StateCreationOperation.html).' operationId: Home-initiateProcess requestBody: content: application/vnd.step2cmt+json: schema: type: object properties: in: type: string description: Data Element responses: "200": description: initiateProcess successful execution content: application/vnd.restbucks.order-payment+json: schema: type: object properties: out: type: integer description: Data Element format: int32 links: transferToStep2: operationId: Home-continueProcessing parameters: transferToStep2: HALInstance1 resource: ResourceForStep2 verb: PUT cmt: CustomMediaTypeRepresentationJSON description: 'Targeted operation: continueProcessing' /home/{id}: summary: activity-oriented endpoint put: tags: - RESTLevel3Provider-ResourceForStep2 summary: continueProcessing (read and write method) description: '[State Transition Operation](https://microservice-api-patterns.org/patterns/responsibility/operationResponsibilities/StateTransitionOperation.html).' operationId: ResourceForStep2-continueProcessing requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: id2: type: string description: Generic parameter responses: "200": description: continueProcessing successful execution content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: statusCode: type: integer description: Data Element format: int32 links: finishProcessing: operationId: ResourceForStep2-terminate parameters: finishProcessing: HALInstance2 resource: Home verb: PUT description: 'Targeted operation: terminate' goElsewhere: operationId: unknownOperation parameters: resource: SomeExternalResource verb: POST cmt: ProcessTerminationInformation server: url: SomeExternalResource parameters: - name: id in: path required: true schema: type: string components: schemas: HALInstance1: type: object properties: someMoreILinkInformation: type: string description: Data Element HALInstance2: type: object properties: evenMoreILinkInformation: type: string description: Data Element

Error: notImplemented: path "/home": post: requestBody: contents: unsupported content types: [application/vnd.step2cmt+json]
